name: Cacturne
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day’s desert heat.

attacks.name: Spike Wound
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 50 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Poison Experiment
attacks.effect: You may discard a {G} or {D} Energy attached to Cacturne. If you discard a {G} Energy, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. If you discard a {D} Energy, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
